title: I cant get onto league!
body: So I deleted league because I was getting problems with it, but now that im trying to te redownload league its not working. I download league but when i start it up, it shows up and then its just loads like the new league logo keep spinning like its loading and it stays there doing that, every time i download league again it does the same thing, i need help and dont know what to do.

replies.body: That's a sign something is blocking the Client from opening. It's mostly due to Firewalls, or even background programs stopping it. This [Permissions Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104)should get you back into the game in a jiffy though. Make sure to run through all the steps and if you run into any problems make sure you reach out to me.
